list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’m hungry – I haven’t eaten all day

list_ex_of_english: Nonnative speakers (and their teachers) are hungry to know the rules and regularities of the written language they are learning and teaching.
What motivates us to work for particular rewards such as food when we are hungry, or water when we are thirsty?
They portrayed hungry victims wandering from saloon to saloon, looking for father.
Citizens were seldom hungry, violence and coercion were infrequent, and society was interracial rather than segregated.
Equally, another might move earlier and risk the chance of going hungry to experience higher quality hosts over a larger area.
They appeared particularly wary, and the animals that entered traps were young or hungry.
The prototypes are either incomplete, or too slow or space hungry to be used as a real application.
I was definitely the hungriest and took any story that came my way.
